title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.17 - Dormant accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.17 - Dormant accounts

State Regulations

The authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity shall
deactivate all accounts if there is no account wagering activity during a
period of 36 consecutive months. Such dormant accounts shall be treated as
abandoned property pursuant to section
300
of
the Abandoned Property Law, as prescribed by Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law section 1012(11). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.17

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
